text:
@narendramodi Hope u read the 1st one. But why are u trying to bring the things in control only by allopathic means when our own country has the best means of treatments like yoga & ayurveda. Why don't you make it a rule for covid-19 patent to do yoga for atleast 30minutes
And try to treat....
